Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Playing Back Old Records, Archival Photos & Preserved Animal Research
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: DENYING THE MOON LANDING
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Apollo astronauts and scientific experts reflect on NASA's glorious achievement, and the shock of having their accomplishments questioned 40 years later.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Northern Lights are more than just beautiful. They tell us about the make up of our planet, our sun, and may even be a signpost for the possibility of life on other planets.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Our understanding of the cosmos is limited not only but what we can see, but by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately computer simulations are helping us see what it's like to fly over other worlds and how galaxies interact over millions of years.

Clip.Title: HUBBLE'S CANVAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Peer into the farthest reaches of our galaxy via the famous space telescope.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: BC's Northern, Coastal Boundary is an epic, high-altitude journey, from Seven Sisters Provincial Park, to Salmon Glacier, and the mountains of the Yellowhead highway.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the remote Northern Shore of Nova Scotia, to the red mud perimetre of Prince Edward Island, the warm waters of the Northumberland Strait are the setting for an incredible aerial exploration of these coastlines.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV - TORONTO: A CITY DEBATE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: A lively discussion about the future of Toronto and what makes a city great.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In depth vignettes on issues impacting modern Canadians, taken from the pages of the popular Magazine.

Clip.Title: LIONS IN BATTLE 2
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Forced from their homes and separated from their family forever, two juvenile lions are required to grow up quickly on the Okavango Delta in Africa.. Strangers in their own land, both brothers must lean on each other to survive. Witness their remarkable rite of passage into adulthood as they learn to hunt, fight, and mate, never giving up hope to one day become protectors and providers of their own dynasty.

Clip.Title: SPEED KILLS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: High-speed cameras capture the fierce battles of the ocean's fastest creatures, and 3-D animation reveals the science behind their astounding speeds.

Clip.Title: SPEED KILLS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The fast and violent world of jungle life is examined, with high speed cameras graphically detailing how insects, reptiles, mammals, fish, and birds are able to strike with miraculous speed.

Clip.Title: SPEED KILLS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: High-speed cameras capture the fast-paced battlefield of the African savannah, where cheetahs, lions, crocodiles, hawks, and more hunt their prey with alarming quickness.

Clip.Title: SPEED KILLS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: High-speed cameras capture the fierce battles of the ocean's fastest creatures, and 3-D animation reveals the science behind their astounding speeds.
